ygData.subject: Re: Role/Anon/norm
ygData.msgSnippet: 1) Roleplay vs Anonymous. Roleplay is to allow you to roleplay and I believe with that command you can tweak what items you want to show-- but I am not
ygData.messageBody:
1) Roleplay vs Anonymous. <br><br>Roleplay is to
allow you to roleplay and I believe with that command
you can tweak what items you want to show-- but I am
not sure on how to do that.<br><br>I do know that
Anonymous will not even allow your guild to track you while
Roleplay does. It allows me to be shown on my guild's
whois and still not be found.<br><br>I was constantly
get harrassed for SoWs and gates. I put myself on
anonymous or role play and for a while-- unfortunately, ppl
knew I wouldn't say "no" usually to a quick sow-- or
if not in a group-- to gate. So I go roleplay. For
the most part-- it works out well.<br><br>I don't
know how you avoid it. I get hit up pretty hard
usually for sows. Gates not as much so I don't mind as
much-- although I went to anony once I got gates b/c I
already couldn't stand all the buffs I had to
do.<br><br>shooman out<br>Fatedhue of Drinal.<br><br>PS... I love
emotes you can do when grouping. "Calls down lightning
to strike his enemies". "Teases all the girls into
hitting him black and blue"... etc. <br><br>EQ can be a
lot of fun. I'm so glad these boards in this club
aren't filled with all the hate and anger and
fustrations I see on other boards.<br><br>shoomie out
